headline: Recession Risk Removed After Tariff Pause, Apollo's Slok Says
summary: Torsten Slok, Apollo Global Management chief economist and partner, reacts to President Donald Trump announcing a 90-day pause on higher reciprocal tariffs, while raising duties on China to 125%,...

raw.headline: Recession Risk Removed After Tariff Pause, Apollo's Slok Says
raw.summary: Torsten Slok, Apollo Global Management chief economist and partner, reacts to President Donald Trump announcing a 90-day pause on higher reciprocal tariffs, while raising duties on China to 125%,...

headline: Apollo CEO Marc Rowan: ‘We Needed To Reset Our Trade Policy’
summary: Apollo Global Management Chief Executive Marc Rowan said he thinks the tariffs are good because the U.S. needed to reset its trade policy.  Rowan, who was a contender to be President Trump’s treasury secretary, said the U.S. should change its status as one of the freest trading markets in the world.
